name: CreateBulkDevResources
description:
Bulk create developer resources in multiple Figma files.

Use this tool to create multiple developer resources across different Figma files. Successfully created resources will be listed in the response, while any errors will also be provided, indicating issues such as non-existent file keys or duplicate URLs.

parameters.name: dev_resources_list
parameters.description: A JSON array of dev resources to create, each with a name, URL, file key, and node ID.

name.description: The name of the dev resource.

url.description: The URL of the dev resource.

file_key.description: The file key where the dev resource belongs.

node_id.description: The target node to attach the dev resource to.

value_schema.description: A list of dev resources that you want to create.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: A list of dev resources that you want to create.

name.description: The name of the dev resource.

url.description: The URL of the dev resource.

file_key.description: The file key where the dev resource belongs.

node_id.description: The target node to attach the dev resource to.

value_schema.description: A list of dev resources that you want to create.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
